line_1: And saint the perjurer for the pious fraud.
line_2: All, all will vanish, while his priests applaud,

line_1: Serves well the purposes of private fraud.
line_2: For Public good to bellow all abroad,

line_1: And, force defeated, make them Slaves by Fraud;
line_2: Beggar at home a People fear'd abroad,

line_1: Tho' I did yield to a fond Mothers Fraud;
line_2: Or vainly think I would thy Choice applaud,

line_1: How caution watches at the lips of fraud;
line_2: How formal fools the farce of state applaud;

line_1: Resumes her pow'rs, and spurns the clumsy fraud,
Tho' victory was gain'd by needful fraud.
line_2: The world will still the noble act applaud,

line_1: Happy at home, secure from force and fraud,
line_2: And makes it great and glorious, fear'd abroad,

line_1: On secret Rapin bent, and Midnight Fraud;
line_2: Again: the lonely Fox roams far abroad,
